availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married Sarah K. Kirby. Owned one enslaved person in Mercer County in 1850. Farmer in Mercer County in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Mercer County in 1860. Farmer in Mercer County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mercer County Marriages, Film #000191859, p. 483
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, p. 284A
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, p. 880
